name: Dark Material Google Apps-Search-Bar
description:
This is All in one.
Dark material theme for google mail, google drive and google calendar.
Dark Google Bar.
Dark Google Search.
I will add more apps soon.
Have fun!
additional_info:
This is the dark material style of the most used basic google apps. Gmail, Drive, Calendar and Contacts.
More google apps and functions will be added as soon as i have time.

2) Many fixes
